name: Nadeem Jamali
content: Nadeem Jamali Â Â Agents Laboratory department of computer science, university of saskatchewan Â Â Nadeem Jamali, Director Office: 281.6 Thorvaldson Building Mailing Address: Â Â Â  176 Thorv Bldg, 110 Science Place Â Â Â  Department of Computer Science Â Â Â  University of Saskatchewan Â Â Â  Saskatoon, SK, S7N 5C9, Canada Phone: +1-306-966-2579 Fax: +1-306-966-4884 Email: jamaliÂ Â Â Â  agents.usask.ca Dr. Jamali is Director of the Agents Laboratory at University of Saskatchewan and Professor of Computer Science.Â  He is interested in developing software abstractions, theories, and high-level programming language support for enabling concurrent computations in open networks of peer-owned resources. Selected Publications Professional Activities Guest Editor, Computer Journal, Special Issue on Massively Multi-Agent Systems, 2009 - 2010 Co-chair:Â  AGERE!@SPLASH 2013, DOCM3AS 2011, MMAS 2009,Â  CCMMS 2007, MMAS 2006 (in conjunction with AAMAS conferences) Program Committees: SASO 2012, AAMAS 2012, AGERE 2011, SASO 2011, AAMAS 2010, MMAS 2004 Books Nadeem Jamali, Paul Scerri, Toshiharu Sugawara (eds.), Massively Multi-Agent Technology: Lecture Notes in Computer Science, vol. 5043, 191 p., Springer, August 2008.
